# Saad Ahmed — Software Engineer

## About
Saad Ahmed is a Software Engineer specializing in full-stack development and AI-powered systems. He architects production-grade platforms — from multi-tenant SaaS dashboards to RAG-based conversational agents — using Next.js, TypeScript, Python, and LangChain. His work sits at the intersection of solid engineering and applied AI: building systems that are not just functional, but reliable, maintainable, and designed for scale.

## Location
Lahore, Pakistan (PKT, UTC+5)

## Skills & Expertise

### Frontend
- React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Material UI

### Backend
- Node.js, Python, NestJS, FastAPI, Prisma, Express

### AI & LLMs
- LangChain, LangGraph, OpenAI SDK, RAG Systems, vLLM, AI Agents

### Databases
- PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, pgvector, Qdrant

## Notable Projects
- TopCareersCaribbean: AI-powered job board with intelligent candidate matching and AI agents (Next.js, Express, Prisma, PostgreSQL, OpenAI SDK)
- AI Chatbot SaaS Platform: Multi-tenant SaaS with embeddable chatbot widget, Stripe billing, and RAG-powered knowledge retrieval (Next.js, FastAPI, LangGraph, pgvector)
- AI Resume Builder: Action-oriented agent chatbot for resume generation from plain English (Next.js, TypeScript, OpenAI, LangChain)
- n8n Multi-Tenant AI Backend: Production AI backend with PLLuM, Nomic embeddings, and reranker models (n8n, Python)
- Human Activity Recognition: Real-time multi-person activity classification at 33 FPS for hospital robotics (Python, PyTorch, TensorRT)

## Experience
- Software Engineer at Teczon LLC (Jan 2025 – Present): Building AI-native products and full-stack platforms
- Full Stack Web Developer at Rutal, Inc (Jul 2024 – Dec 2024): Backend architecture and full-stack delivery
- Web Developer at PITB — NEP/NIC (May 2023 – Oct 2023): Building and shipping products for startup teams

## Education
- BS Software Engineering, University of Gujrat (2020–2024)
